description:
The best city car driving games you can play in your web browser:

• Crazy Taxi - This is a classic city driving game where you have to pick up passengers and drive them to their destinations as fast as you can. The web browser version has retro PS1-style graphics that give it a fun, arcade feel.

• Need for Speed - The popular racing game franchise has a few web browser-based city driving games you can play, like Need for Speed Underground 2 and Most Wanted. These allow you to drive exotic cars around bustling cities and do races against opponents.

• Race Room Racing Experience - This realistic sim racing game has a browser version where you can drive supercars through European cities like London, Barcelona and Rome. The graphics and physics engine aim for a realistic driving experience.

• Car Maniac Drive - This web game has arcade-style city driving with cartoony graphics. You can choose from a variety of vehicles and explore an open world city doing stunts, collecting coins and more.

• Midnight Racing: Tokyo - This single player city racing game tasks you with completing a number of driving challenges around Tokyo. You can choose from sports cars and upgrade them with better parts as you progress.

Those are a few great options for playing car driving games right in your browser on any device. The browser-based nature means you don't have to download or install anything and can just jump right into the game. Hope this helps!
name: city car driving
